headline: ETHISPHERE NAMES KELLANOVA AS ONE OF THE 2025 WORLD'S MOST ETHICAL COMPANIES速
summary: Kellanova has received the 2025 World's Most Ethical Companies速 recognition by Ethisphere, a global leader in defining and advancing the standards of ethical business practices.
